name: Word Return
description:
Hello!

Word Return is a little game I have build because of Brackeys Game Jam #9. It made lots of fun creating that game. I hope you like it too and leave me a comment or rate it.

A Web-Version of the game will come here after the voting of the Jam ended.

After the Game Jam ends, there will be a .zip with all game files to download for Windows and there will be a macOS and Linux version of it.
